availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ben Spalding Jr. (Marion County, Ky, clerk)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah A. Spalding. Father of Mary E. Spalding, Eulilia A. Spalding, Susan Spalding, Laurence Spalding, and Joseph Spalding. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Raywick in 1860. Signed a petition to Beriah Magoffin in behalf of Felix C. Jenkins in Marion County, Kentucky, in September 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p. 336B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Raywick District 1, p. 561.
KYR-0001-020-1446.
